examples.example: 有时候，生活中的小惊喜会让我们一整天都心情愉悦。

translate.english: Sometimes, the small surprises in life can make us feel happy all day long.

examples.example: 有时候，抬头看看那湛蓝的天空，会感觉心情格外舒畅。

translate.english: Sometimes, looking up at the blue sky will feel extremely comfortable in mood.

examples.example: 有时候，一句鼓励的话语就能给人带来无尽的力量。

translate.english: Sometimes, a word of encouragement can bring endless power to people.
